Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Just as the name suggests,
fireworks are like artworks in the sky.
They were quite beautiful.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fireworks were beautiful.
They better than I had imagined.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They were beautiful fireworks.
Not as beautiful as my princess though.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>What is that? Are you embarrassed?
My princess is truly adorable.
I just want to sweep you off your feet.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fireworks were beautiful, but
the profile of your face
lit by the fireworks was also charming.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If the others weren't with us,
I would kiss you
on the cheek.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the fireworks end,
it feels like waking from a dream.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>But even if it was all a dream,
I am glad I am not dreaming that
you are my wife.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Even if our marriage was a dream,
I would just marry you again.
<PAGE>
Dream or reality, I would never be
without you.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fireworks were very beautiful.
Being with you
might make them more so.
<PAGE>
We don't have many opportunities
to be outside together this late,
and today's Fireworks Festival was fun.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sound of fireworks takes a
weight off your chest, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
I think I understand how people feel
when they yell out toward fireworks.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I wouldn't do anything
so unsightly though.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If there were no fireworks, summer
nights would probably feel duller. 
<PAGE>
Whoever thought of fireworks
was a genius.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fireworks were very pretty!
It is a shame that they are over.
I wanted to see more.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fireworks
were very pretty!
<PAGE>
They seemed to go a little long,
but they seem short now that it's over.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Everything lit up
the instant the fireworks went up.
<PAGE>
I love that
instant.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Why? Because when it gets bright,
I can clearly see the face of you
having fun, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Weren't the fireworks pretty?
It seemed like the time
passed so quickly.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>It is quite late,
so you should take care
on your way home, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>... Ah, I know!
Should I drop you off?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You don't have to
be shy.
I am your boyfriend, after all!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is a little sad when the
fireworks end, isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>If I went home alone after
feeling like this I might
feel twice as sad.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But even after I go home,
you will be next to me! Because of
that, I will never feel sad!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha!
Sorry, I just laughed
when I remembered something.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Every time the fireworks went up,
you were surprised by the sound
and squeezed my hand, didn't you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>That was cuter than anything else.
...Hold my hand again next year.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Doesn't the sound of the fireworks
startle you a little?
<PAGE>
It is the same as thunder, isn't it?
Even though you know it is coming,
it is surprising when it does come.
<PAGE>
I wonder if there is someone
who isn't bothered by that instant?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder if it is true that Dunhill
is actually involved in making
fireworks a little.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>That is amazing if it is true.
When I went to the shop the other day,
he also seemed familiar handling pets.
<PAGE>
Maybe there is nothing that
he can't do.
I respect him so much!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Enormous flowers blooming in the sky.
It is very beautiful.
I was impressed.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is a little sad
when the fireworks end, isn't it?
<PAGE>
While they were on,
I was so absorbed and
didn't feel that way at all though.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fireworks were very
colorful and pretty, weren't they?
<PAGE>
I thought it was just like you,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
When I say colorful, I mean that
your expressions change so frequently,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I never grow tired of looking at you.
You look just alike.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fireworks were great, weren't they?
Time seemed to pass
so quickly.
<PAGE>
It is quite late, so you should take
care on your way home.
<MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If you want, I could
drop you off at home.
Don't be shy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE><MYNAME>, you are...
you know...
my precious girlfriend.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is a little sad
when the fireworks end, isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Going home on your own when you
feel like this akes you feel twice as
sad, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But if I go home,
I have you
to keep me company.
<PAGE>
I won't feel sad.
In fact, I will probably smile.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Haha, I'm sorry.
I just remembered something funny.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>,
you seemed surprised at every 
firework and squeezed both hands.
<PAGE>
That made me feel happy.
You should have
held my hand.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I am your husband, <MYNAME>...
I'll feel hurt if you don't rely
on me.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have a friend who is
a fireworks artist.
<PAGE>
Recent fireworks
are timed to match music
and are in the shape of characters...
<PAGE>
They seem to be
evolving in various ways.
<PAGE>
But in the end,
I like the good old type of fireworks
like the Fireworks Festival.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fireworks are deserving of their
name.
<PAGE>
The way that the fireworks
scatter in the sky, they look
just like flowers.
<PAGE>
Intuitive, yet surprisingly deep.
I think it is a really good name.
Whoever thought that up is amazing.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
No matter how many times I hear it,
the  explosions always surprise me.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, weren't you bothered?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Weren't the fireworks fantastic?
It is unbelievable that
they are manmade.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fireworks were great.
Being with you
might make them seem more so.
<PAGE>
We don't have many opportunities to be
outside together this late, and today's
Fireworks Festival was very enjoyable.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fireworks were great, weren't they?
Time seemed to pass
so quickly.
<PAGE>
It is quite late,
so you should take care
on your way home.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I wish I were able to take you home
but I must take
Amir to the mansion.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I am very sorry,
but please take care
on your way home.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is a little sad when the
fireworks end, isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Going home on your own when you
feel like this makes you feel twice as
sad, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But after I go home,
you will be with me.
Knowing that, how could I be sad.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha, ah!　Sorry.
I just thought about something from
earlier and couldn't help but smile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>. Every time the fireworks went
up, you were startled and squeezed your
hands together a little, didn't you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>That looked
more charming than anything else.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I was close,
so you should have
held my hand.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the fireworks went up,
people were shouting out "bravo!"
<PAGE>
Fireworks look so much like
some kind of amazing natural spectacle,
it's easy to forget people make them.
<PAGE>
I guess they shouted out "bravo"
to the fireworks for that reason.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>A show of appreciation to
the people who did such a good job
making the fireworks.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Red blue, yellow...
fireworks come in many colors.
<PAGE>
I wonder how they make
the colors of fireworks.
<PAGE>
Do they use colored
feathers as materials
like in clothes?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fireworks were quite good.
It is a little sad that
they ended so quickly...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The sound of fireworks
really shakes your body, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>My heart jumps every time
they go bang.
I wonder why...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fireworks were amazing.
Time seemed to pass
so quickly.
<PAGE>
It is quite late, so you'd better
take care on your way home.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>If you want,
I'll take you.
<PAGE>
Don't be shy.
You're my girlfriend, you know? You
don't have to be shy about anything.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
They were really beautiful fireworks.
Being with you
might make them seem more like that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>... What am I talking about?
Just forget what I said!
<PAGE>
You didn't hear me, did you?
Even if you did,
just pretend that you didn't!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the fireworks end,
it feels like waking from a dream.
<PAGE>
Maybe me and you
getting married was
all a dream too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Hey!
Don't start crying!
I'm just kidding!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>... Seriously.
Even if it was all a dream,
I would marry you time and time again.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>So don't worry.
I couldn't dream of anyone else.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You were startled every time
the fireworks went up, weren't you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Look, there are marks from your
fingernails on the palm of your hand.
How tight were you squeezing it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>When that happens, hold my hand
instead of your own.
Holding my hand is more comforting.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come to think of it, why are fireworks
a regular event in summer?
<PAGE>
I don't see any problem
with having fireworks in
other seasons...

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Toni kept shouting
"bravo" and "thank you"
at the fireworks...
<PAGE>
I wonder why. It's not as
if they can understand.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Or can they?
They're not alive, are they? 
Haha, that's impossible... Right?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
They really are what
summer is all about.
The fireworks were great.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They were beautiful fireworks.
It is a little sad that
they ended so quickly...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>They are limited in number
and that is probably why
they attract so many people.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fireworks were wonderful.
Being with you
might make them seem more like that.
<PAGE>
We don't have many opportunities
to be outside together this late.
The Fireworks Festival was enjoyable.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fireworks were great, weren't they?
Time seemed to pass
so quickly.
<PAGE>
It seems to quite late,
so take care
on your way home.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But I must say I am a bit worried.
What if something happened to you.
Should I take you home?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Don't be shy.
It is only natural that I would want to
take care of a person I love, isn't it?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is a little sad
when the fireworks end, isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Going home on your own when you
feel like this  makes you feel twice
as sad, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But after I go home,
you will be with me.
<PAGE>
So I won't feel sad at all. In fact,
I won't be able to stop smiling if I am
with you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha, I'm sorry.
I just remembered about earlier
and couldn't help but smile.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>. Every time the fireworks went
up, you were startled and squeezed
your hands together, didn't you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>That looked
more charming than anything else.
<PAGE>
But I was nearby,
so you should have
held my hand.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have heard that fireworks are shaped
like a round ball before they are fired.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I wonder how they make
such beautiful patterns
in the sky...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I would like to see them being made
one day.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In my country, we always
use fireworks for celebrations
no matter what the season is.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>They might not beat the atmosphere of
summer fireworks, but fireworks
in the winter sky are pretty good.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, if you have a chance
to come to my country,
I hope you can see them.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It looked like a flower of light
bloomed in the sky!
It was really pretty, wasn't it? ♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The fireworks are so beautiful,
but they look a little blurry
when you take a photo of them.
<PAGE>
I guess it is a little difficult
to take photos at night.
I suppose nothing can be done about it.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fireworks were very beautiful!
Being with you might have
made them seem more so ♪
<PAGE>
We don't have many chances to
be out together this late.
Today was really fun!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When fireworks go up,
everything is lit up for an instant.
<PAGE>
I really love
that instant.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Why? Because when it gets bright,
I can clearly see the face of you
having fun, <MYNAME>♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is a little sad when the
fireworks end, isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Going home on my own
when I feel like this might
make me feel even sadder...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But I will have you
with me even after I go home!
<PAGE>
That is why I won't feel sad
at all♪

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the fireworks end,
it feels like waking from
a dream.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Maybe me and you
getting married was all a
dream. too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Nooo!
I couldn't stand
that!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>It's just a "what if" thought,
but marry me again, even if it is
just a dream, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the fireworks end, I feel a little
sad because it seems like summer will
end, too.
<PAGE>
I don't like hot weather, but summer 
has lots of fun things that you can only
do in summer, don't you think?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>For example, seeing fireflies and cold
ice cream being so delicious!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Well, fall has lots of fun things, too,
so that is just as sad as summer ending.
<PAGE>
I am also looking forward to the arrival
of fall!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The loud bang that fireworks make
is good, isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Here it is!　It really feels like
these are fireworks!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fireworks were
very pretty, weren't they?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But I hope there is somebody
nice beside me
at next year's Fireworks Festival... <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Weren't those some very nice fireworks?
I wish there were
more though...
<PAGE>
It might actually be better
if there isn't quite enough
because of the emotion it creates.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Weren't those fireworks pretty?
Perhaps they seemed even more so because
I was with you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
We don't have many opportunities
to be out together so late...
Today was very enjoyable. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When fireworks go up
everything is lit up for an instant.
<PAGE>
I really love
that instant.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Because when it gets bright,
I can clearly see your face, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
The face of somebody you like is always
something you want to look at. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't you get a little sad
when the fireworks
end?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Going home on my own
when I feel like this
might make me feel even sadder...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But if I go home,
I have <MYNAME>
to keep me company.
<PAGE>
I won't feel lonely
at all ♪

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the fireworks end,
it feels like waking from
a dream.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD><MYNAME>.
What would you do if your marriage
to me was a dream?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I know, it's silly!
You don't have to panic.
It's just a joke.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But the fact that you panicked
means that you really
love me, doesn't it?.
<PAGE>
It can't be helped. Even in a dream,
I would marry you again.
I can't imagine anyone but you either.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In the circus I used to belong to,
they ended the performance with
fireworks as a grand finale.
<PAGE>
Of course,
the fireworks weren't as big as
this Fireworks Festival...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>However, despite being small,
they were wonderful fireworks
that made everyone happy ♪
<PAGE>
Haha... Brings back so many memories.
Come to think of it, I wonder
what everyone from the circus is doing.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
The fireworks were very pretty, but
the loud noise always
startles me.
<PAGE>
I wonder if anybody saw me
getting startled so many times.
It would be embarrassing if they did.
<PAGE>
Don't tell anyone about this.
It is just a secret
between you and me. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The big flowers blooming in the sky
were very beautiful...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
The fireworks were pretty,
but my neck hurts after
looking up for so long.
<PAGE>
Everyone else seems alright though.
They must have strong necks.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today's fireworks were very pretty...
Maybe it was because you were
here, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>You are wonderful.
You are like a magician.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the fireworks were in the sky,
and everything lit up...
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>'s face
became clear...
and...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I don't know why, but instead of being
startled by the sound of the fireworks,
my heart began to pound...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>There might be something wrong with me.
I need to see a doctor
tomorrow...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is a little sad when the fireworks
end, isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Going home and spending time on my own
when I feel like this might
make me feel even sadder...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But at home, I have you to
keep me company. So I won't
feel sad...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
The loud noise made by fireworks...
is a little startling...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS><MYNAME>, do you get
startled, too?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>... Oh, really?
It's not just me then.
That's good.
<PAGE>
You and I are a good couple, 
aren't we?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I wonder why the sparks from
fireworks don't fall on our heads
even though they seem like they should.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lightning and fireworks
are a little similar because
they make a loud noise and flash...
<PAGE>
Lightning wouldn't be so scary,
if it was pretty
like fireworks.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fireworks were so wonderful that
they inspired everyone watching.
<PAGE>
I might be getting ahead of myself,
but I would like to attend the
Fireworks Festival again next year.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Fireworks look great
every time you see them.
<PAGE>
The people making such wonderful
fireworks must go to
so much trouble...
<PAGE>
It really is amazing that they can make
the people enjoy themselves so much.
I'm so grateful to them.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Weren't the fireworks were very pretty?
Being with you
might make them seem more like that.
<PAGE>
We don't have many opportunities to
spend time outside together this late.
Today was really fun!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the fireworks went up, everything
lit up for an instant, didn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I like that instant
a little.
<PAGE>
Because I can clearly see your face
while you are enjoying yourself.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It is just a little sad
when the fireworks end, isn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Going home on my own
when I feel like this
might make me feel even sadder.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But if I go home,
I have <MYNAME>
to keep me company.
<PAGE>
I won't feel lonely
at all.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the fireworks end, it feels like
waking from a dream, doesn't it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>What if my marriage to <MYNAME>
was also all
a dream...?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Never.
I don't even want to think that.
<PAGE>
I cannot imagine having a husband
other than you
and don't even want to imagine it.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The big fireworks are good
but I prefer the sparklers our family
had at home years ago.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>They are little, dull fireworks,
but I don't think any other
fireworks are so emotion-stirring.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I heard couples that spend time together
at the Fireworks Festival stay together,
but do you think it is true?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>No, I was just wondering if it
was true. I am not really worried about
it.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Weren't the fireworks wonderful?
It was like flowers were
really blooming in the sky!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The fireworks were so big and
impressive!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>They were so amazing
that my jaw was agape the whole time.
I am so embarrassed.

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Weren't the fireworks pretty?
I feel like they were even more so
because I was with you.
<PAGE>
We don't have many opportunities
to be out together so late...
Today was very enjoyable.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the fireworks went up, everything
lit up for an instant, didn't it?
<PAGE>
I really love that
instant.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Because when it gets bright,
I can clearly see the face of you
having fun.
<PAGE>
The face of somebody you like is always
something you want to look at. <RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't you feel a little sad when
the fireworks end?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>If you go home and spend time alone
feeling like this you'd feel even
sadder, wouldn't you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But if I go home, I have
you to keep me company.
<PAGE>
That is why I won't feel lonely
at all.<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the fireworks end,
it feels like waking from
a dream.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Maybe me and <MYNAME>
getting married was
actually all a dream too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>.......
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>...(sob).
I couldn't stand that!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, if it is a dream,
please marry me again
when I wake up!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Fireworks Festival in the town
I used to live in
had places to play ring toss games
<PAGE>
and stalls where you could
scoop up goldfish.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I went there a lot when I was little
and played there with my sister without
giving the fireworks a second thought.
<PAGE>
That brings back some memories!
